summary: It is about true love, that comes only once a life. But unfortunately a terrible disease doesn't give them chance to be happy together.
cast: Özcan Deniz|Fahriye Evcen Özçivit|Sait Genay|Özay Fecht|Levent Öktem|Günes Hayat|Teoman Kumbaracibasi|Gizem Denizci|Baris Yalçin|Volga Sorgu|Ayse Melike Çerçi|Zeynep Ender Ige|Efe Deprem|Kayhan Yildizoglu|Pelin Dinçer|Alper Yagmurcu|Rafi Emeksiz|Ergin Torun|Fatih Yildiz|Emrah Aksik|Hasan Irmak|Nimet Öztas|Engin Bilgiç|Kenan Yesildag
title: Evim Sensin
